ComicInfo.Summary:
La Sonja Rossa: Captain Vitale Boulos narrates the story of how Red Sonja drowned fighting a demon squid that attacked and destroyed his ship.
Legends of Red Sonja (part 2): Eles and Dagar continue the hunt for Red Sonja
Eyes of the Howling God: Eles tells the story of how Red Sonja killed the Howling God and stole the ruby eyes of of his statue.
Legends of Red Sonja (part 1): Kahar, Eles and their band hunt Red Sonja
ComicInfo.Title: La Sonja Rossa; Legends of Red Sonja (part 2); Eyes of the Howling God; Legends of Red Sonja (part 1)
ComicInfo.Writer: Devin Grayson,Gail Simone,Nancy A. Collins,Devin Kalile Grayson,Gail Simone,Nancy A. Collins
